sense.def:
One's skin
je naravni sloj snovi, ki prekriva človekovo telo.

seg.quote: They had light skin and blue eyes.
The poison may be absorbed through the skin.
The Lapps of Scandinavia have fair skins.

sense.def:
An animal skin
je koža z dlako, ki so jo odrli z mrtve živali.

seg.quote: A few coats hung in the closet, one of leopard skin.

sense.def:
The skin of a type of food
je zunanji ali varovalni sloj na živilu.

seg.quote: Cook the potatoes quickly with their skins on.

sense.def:
A skin
je tudi precej trd sloj, ki se naredi na površini tekočine.

seg.quote: The custard had a thick skin on it.

sense.def:
To skin a dead animal
pomeni odstraniti kožo z mrtve živali.

seg.quote: The boys skinned and cleaned the day's game.

sense.def:
To skin part of one's body
pomeni po nesreči opraskati nekaj kože z dela telesa.

Kadar nekdo nekaj naredi
by the skin of one's teeth
, mu komaj uspe narediti tisto.
